title: Unable to update client after reinstall 6.24
body: I was getting in game problems so I tried to reinstall the client. Once I did it will not patch and only gets to about 5% before I get a message saying unspecified error check logs. No idea how to go about trying to fix this issue.

replies.body: Getting that error at 5% suggests a security setting that's preventing the patcher from scanning game files.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
